alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 5:36AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Cherry County through 615 AM CDT/515 AM MDT/... At 536 AM CDT/436 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Merritt Reservoir, or 15 miles west of Valentine, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Valentine, Kilgore, Merritt Reservoir, Crookston, Wood Lake, Anderson Bridge State Wildlife Management Area, Smith Falls State Park, Schlagel Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Highway 97 crossing the Niobrara River, Sparks and Big Alkali Lake State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 173 and 223. Highway 97 between mile markers 117 and 141. Highway 83 between mile markers 194 and 220. Highway 12 between mile markers 1 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
